Text:
Easy Video Converter Publisher's Description:

Easy Video Converter is a small and effective solution for video file converting. It supports: AVI to MPEG1, MPEG2, DVD, VCD, and SVCD; and all media formats to DivX(MPEG4) and AVI, even your digital photos. PAL to NTSC conversion and vice versa are also included.Support streaming media (WMV/ASF).
